name: EXQUISITE WHEEL
description:
On 18 August 2019, Ben Roswell ran the #deckjam through Twitter:  participants wrote cards based on on Sasha Reneau's "Spindlewheel," with each card using the one before it as inspiration. In all, participants wrote 139 cards.  

This twine game collects those tweets into a browseable format. Follow the paths. Make connections. Games are poems. Enjoy everything.
